details: Urine Section.Renal and urinary affections, especially DIABETES. Enuresis due to vesical atony; senile incontinence. Hematuria and cystitis come within the range of this remedy.PALE, albuminous. INCONTINENCE. SEVERE PAIN AT BEGINNING OR BEFORE URINATION, causing great agony in children. Constant dribbling. DIABETES, large quantities of urine of low specific gravity. (PHOS-AC.; ACET-AC.)
name: Rhus aromatic
